description: NeonDatePicker is the equivalent of the native HTML Date Input. It accepts an ISO 8601 date string as values & allows the user to select a date. Dates are formatted with the provided locale, if none is provided the browser locale is used as a default. On touch devices the native date picker is presented to the user. This component interaction was inspired by this vue-datepicker

props.name: modelValue
props.description: The selected date. A date string in the ISO 8601 format.

props.name: locale
props.description: The locale used for display purposes. This defaults to the browser's locale if none is provided.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Disable date picker

props.name: size
props.description: The size of the date picker, one of NeonSize.Small | NeonSize.Medium | NeonSize.Large.

props.name: color
props.description: Color of the date picker

props.name: min
props.description: Minimum allowed date value in the ISO 8601 format.

props.name: max
props.description: Maximum allowed date value in the ISO 8601 format.

props.name: disabledDates
props.description: Disabled dates, a list of ISO 8601 format dates for which to disable selection.

props.name: placeholder
props.description: This is the placeholder for the text input when no value is provided.

props.name: openCalendarLabel
props.description: This is the label of the input field which opens the calendar. This is technically a button.

props.name: doneLabel
props.description: This is the label of the 'Done' button in the calendar popup.

props.name: clearLabel
props.description: This is the label of the 'Clear' button in the calendar popup.

props.name: changeMonthLabel
props.description: This is the ARIA label of the 'Change month' button in the calendar popup.

props.name: previousMonthLabel
props.description: This is the ARIA label of the 'Previous month' button in the calendar popup.

props.name: nextMonthLabel
props.description: This is the ARIA label of the 'Next month' button in the calendar popup.

props.name: changeYearLabel
props.description: This is the ARIA label of the 'Change year' button in the calendar popup.

props.name: previousYearLabel
props.description: This is the ARIA label of the 'Previous year' button in the calendar popup.

props.name: nextYearLabel
props.description: This is the ARIA label of the 'Next year' button in the calendar popup.

props.name: previousDecadeLabel
props.description: This is the ARIA label of the 'Previous decade' button in the calendar popup.

props.name: nextDecadeLabel
props.description: This is the ARIA label of the 'Next decade' button in the calendar popup.
